---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new feature or enhancement
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like.

## Use Case
Describe the problem this feature would solve or the use case it enables.

**Example:**
> As a security analyst, I want to detect accounts with SID History so that I can identify potential privilege escalation risks.

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternatives Considered
Any alternative solutions or workarounds you've considered.

## Additional Context
- Screenshots, mockups, or examples from other tools
- Relevant documentation or research links
- Any other context

## Implementation Notes
If you have ideas on how to implement this:
- Which files might need changes
- Any potential challenges
- Performance considerations

## Checklist
- [ ] I have searched existing issues and discussions
- [ ] This feature aligns with the project's goals
- [ ] I'm willing to help implement this feature
